articles.author: Somini Sengupta
articles.title: U.N. Climate Talks End With Big Polluters Blocking Stronger Action
articles.description: The United Nations secretary general, António Guterres, said countries had “lost an important opportunity” at the meeting in Madrid.
articles.content:
The talks were designed to iron out the last unresolved details of the landmark Paris climate agreement. Under that pact, agreed to in 2015, countries set their own targets and timetables to rein in emissions of planet-warming gases.
There was a push from bo… [+990 chars]

articles.author: Sam Sifton
articles.title: What to Cook This Week
articles.description: Try Yotam Ottolenghi’s upside-down lemon sponge cake, or Melissa Clark’s stunning Feast of the Seven Fishes pie.
articles.content: Tuesday, yet another new one: Lidey Heucks chile and honey roasted salmon, which really and truly benefits from making it with wild-caught salmon instead of farmed. Someday well nail down a really good farmed salmon. Melissa Clarks out reporting on that even … [+1306 chars]

articles.author: Johnny Diaz
articles.title: Military Investigating Suspected ‘White Power’ Hand Gestures Flashed at Game
articles.description: The Army and Naval academies said they were looking into whether hand symbols by cadets and midshipmen at a football game on Saturday were related to hate groups.
articles.content:
The gesture, which looks like an O.K. sign, is formed by the thumb and forefinger joined together in a circle, the remaining three fingers splayed out behind, according to the Southern Poverty Law Center.
The center, a nonprofit group that monitors hate grou… [+862 chars]

articles.title: USA SECRETLY EXPELS CHINESE DIPLOMATS
articles.description: WASHINGTON — The American government secretly expelled two Chinese Embassy officials this fall after they drove on to a sensitive military base in Virginia, according to people with knowledge of the episode.
articles.content:
The Chinese Embassy in Washington. The expulsions show the American government is now taking a harder line against suspected espionage by China.
The Elizabeth River in Norfolk, Va. The military base intrusion took place in late September on an installation c… [+9270 chars]

articles.author: Michael Cooper
articles.title: Pipe Dreams: Will an Organ Roar in the New Geffen Hall?
articles.description: Organ lovers hope the rebuilt hall will return a pipe organ to the New York Philharmonic’s home. But space is tight.
articles.content:
But the organ was removed during a renovation of the hall in 1976, in part to free up space backstage, and to spare the expense of reducing its size and relocating it within the hall.
The instrument found a new home in a California megachurch, the televangel… [+1817 chars]
